verses.name: Hebrews 8:10
verses.text: For this is the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel after those days, saith the Lord; I will put my laws into their mind, and write them in their hearts: and I will be to them a God, and they shall be to me a people:

verses.name: Hebrews 8:11
verses.text: And they shall not teach every man his neighbour, and every man his brother, saying, Know the Lord: for all shall know me, from the least to the greatest.

verses.name: Hebrews 8:12
verses.text: For I will be merciful to their unrighteousness, and their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more.
